body_html:
This is better suited for stackoverflow.

Small batches have worse performance because of how modern hardware architecture is structured. IE, single image batches on CPU, it will have to load neural net parameters into cache for each image. For 200-batch, it can load those parameters into cache once, and reuse them for all 200 images.

There are sometimes tricks to speed up small batches, ie, by using libxsmm which has some integration with TensorFlow.
